description: AI website builder. From curated images to AI-written content, get the professional site your business needs with none of the work. Starting at $12 per month.
title: AI Website Builder: Create a Website in 30 Seconds
introduction: Durable is a website builder platform that offers a 'no code' solution for building websites. It includes features like AI Assistant, Invoicing, an AI-powered CRM, and more. Users can create and publish multiple websites from one account with Durable Pro.
features: Custom domains included depending on the plan
Affiliate program available on a case by case basis
Support for switching from other website builders
Ability to cancel subscription without deleting account
Ability to add additional users to websites
pricing: Starter subscription starts at $12 per month, Business subscription starts at $20 per month. Custom domains are free with every subscription.

faqs.question: Are custom domains included in the subscription?
faqs.answer: Nope! Custom domains are free with every Durable subscription and take seconds to create.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my subscription without deleting my account?
faqs.answer: Of course. To cancel your current subscription but **_not_** delete your account, go to **Business** → **Manage**

faqs.question: Is there a money back guarantee?
faqs.answer: If you aren’t satisfied with Durable, we offer a 30 day money back guarantee. Contact [support@durable.co](mailto:support@durable.co) to request a refund.

faqs.question: Can I transfer my custom domain when cancelling my account?
faqs.answer: Yes! When cancelling your account, simply get in touch with us and we’ll arrange to have your custom domain transferred to you. Note that it takes a couple of weeks to transfer over.
